panels.title: Cluster disk read and written bytes
Nodes network read and written bytes
Nodes disk read and written bytes
Nodes network read and written bytes

targets.expr:
topk(10, sum(
  rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{id!="", device=~"(/dev.+)|mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", cluster="", namespace=~".*-tenant"}[5m])
  +
  rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{id!="", device=~"(/dev.+)|mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", cluster="", namespace=~".*-tenant"}[5m])
) by (namespace))

panels.title: Tekton Pipelines controller tasks runs throttle count

panels.description:
In each bucket, we have 8 leases. These leases should be distributed over more than 1 Pipelines controller replicas pods. If they are not, we might need Infra team intervention.

Dashed lines shows "health" intervals: if it is 0 or 1, call Infra team (we have alert for that); if it is 2, it is not giving good performance; 3 or 4 should be OK even during peaks.

custom.axisLabel: Number of pods the bucket is on

panels.title: Pipelines Controller leases distribution

panels.description:
In each bucket, we have 4 leases. These leases should be distributed over more than 1 Resolver replicas pods. If they are not, we might need Infra team intervention.

Dashed lines shows "health" intervals: if it is 0 or 1, call Infra team (we might have an alert for that: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/KONFLUX-5297); if it is 2, it is not giving good performance; 3 or 4 should be OK even during peaks.

custom.axisLabel: Number of pods the bucket is on
